title: Ben Affleck Will Direct A ‘Batman’ Movie If He Can Find The Time
text:
Ben Affleck Will Direct A ‘Batman’ Movie If He Can Find The Time 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
We all know a Batman solo movie is coming . DC and Warner Bros. have Ben Affleck and Chris Terrio already working on the DC Cinematic Univer...
